claim: Flublok ensures identical antigenic match with WHO- and FDA-selected flu strains.

rejected_evidence.quote: Cell and egg based flu vaccines have the potential to develop mutations AVOIDS MUTATIONS4 Cell- and egg based flu vaccines hav
rejected_evidence.original_explanation: This quote highlights that cell- and egg-based flu vaccines can develop mutations, implying that Flublok, by contrast, avoids such mutations. This supports the claim that Flublok ensures an identical antigenic match with WHO- and FDA-selected flu strains by not introducing mutations during production.
